channel.title: I bileve this was alrdy posted but
channel.description:
could some1 make a low level f2p pking server ( this idea was inspired by my mapu <3)
the max combat would be like around 40 ish maybe 64 if u want r2h pures
when you spawn you pick which low level you would like to be ( in example 20 mith 2h pure ) items would be decently hard to obtain but not 2 hard
lobs+str pots would be in bank
imo low level pking owned but thats just my opinion ( and please if some1 does bother 2 use this idea that was inspired by mapu please dont do it on a shitty ass divine pk source rscd ftw :)

item.title: I bileve this was alrdy posted but
item.dc:creator: @ITSJOSHBITCHES ITSJOSHBITCHES
item.description:
@ITSJOSHBITCHES wrote:

hope this server goes thru

Read full topic
item.source: I bileve this was alrdy posted but

item.title: I bileve this was alrdy posted but
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Dark Anima, post:2, topic:232656”]I thought the exact same thing about 2 weeks ago.
In my vision you would start with practically nothing, experience wouldn’t be too hard to obtain, you’d have to do some work to get worthy items like r2h, so you’ll get the feeling of joy when you pk one.
The most vital part of this formula is the max level indeed, which I considered to be 30 to 35.
The final goal is to have 50 people pking in wilderness 1-5, and some propably even deep. Now that would be the best “pvp-economy” since stork pk.

Go for it, I’m willing to join a project in this if someone’s making one.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2008, 01:50:03 am[/size][hr]Actually I started with this already. And yes, with rscd 25.[/quote]Make max like 50.

Read full topic
